title: Golden Chances
description: A new addition to the Homespun romance series. His heart once broken by a woman, wealthy rancher Reese Jordan wants only to hire a wife to bear an heir to his family fortune. Faith Collins needs money to keep her Southern homestead. Theirs is a marriage of convenience--until the warmth of family teaches them the true meaning of love. Romance from the Heart of America
author: Rebecca Hagan Lee
